info.headline: Dust Storm Warning issued October 20 at 11:40AM MDT until October 20 at 12:30PM MDT by NWS Goodland KS
info.description:
The National Weather Service in Goodland has issued a
* Dust Storm Warning for... Eastern Cheyenne County in east central Colorado... Southwestern Wallace County in west central Kansas... Northwestern Greeley County in west central Kansas...
* Until 1230 PM MDT.
* At 1138 AM MDT, a dust channel was located near the Colorado and Kansas state line between Weksan and Arapahoe, into rural northwest Greeley County.
HAZARD...Less than a quarter mile visibility with strong wind in excess of 50 mph.
SOURCE...Doppler radar.
IMPACT...Dangerous life-threatening travel.
* Highway 40 between Weskan and Arapahoe. Highway 96 between Tribune and Tower.
Locations impacted include... Weskan and Horace.
info.instruction: Dust storms lead to dangerous driving conditions with visibility reduced to near zero. If driving, avoid dust storms if possible. If caught in one, pull off the road, turn off your lights and keep your foot off the brake.

parameter.value: NWS: DUST STORM WARNING til 12:30 PM MDT. Be ready for a sudden drop to zero visibility.

National Weather Service: DUST STORM WARNING for this area until 12:30 PM MDT. Be ready for sudden drop to zero visibility. Pull Aside, Stay Alive! When visibility drops, pull far off the road and put your vehicle in park. Turn the lights off and keep your foot off the brake. Infants, the elderly and those with respiratory issues urged to take precautions.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne, CO; Greeley, KS; Wallace, KS

parameter.value: SNM: AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 12:30 PM MDT. Espere reduccion de visibilidad.

AVISO DE TORMENTA DE POLVO hasta las 12:30 PM MDT. Estar alerta para una reduccion repentina en visibilidad. Cuando la visibilidad disminuya, mueva su vehiculo fuera de la carretera. Apague las luces y mantenga su pie fuera del freno. Se recomienda enfaticamente el tomar precauciones para los infantes, ancianos y personas con problemas respiratorios.

area.areaDesc: Cheyenne, CO; Greeley, KS; Wallace, KS
